alert.note: Alert for Marion; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Marion and Webster Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Preston, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Preston, Seminole, Church Hill, Kimbrough and Dumas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
